Text: Thanks for sharing GIANNIS511. Having said that, *if* I had paid $4.99 for this piece of crap I'd be pissed off that half of the book reprints an awful Alpha Flight issue from the early '90s. Fuck you Marvel!
right there with ya STFmaryville... thanks for the upload Giannis511, but what a BS rip-off!
Am I the only one who noticed the first quarter of the book is at the end?  The pages have been mis-numbered.
